name: Journey of the White Monster
description:
Playing on full screen is recommended.

The 2D platformer in which you manipulate the objects around the character to help him go on.

- Drag and drop platforms and strings to avoid obstacles

- Destroy orange balls by clicking on them

- Remove orange boxes from the path.

Game made for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was 'Keep it alive!'.

The main theme comes from here: https://frelon-k-games.itch.io/free-chiptune-pack-no2
